name: The CREATURE Quiz | Wordplay for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters from CREATURE, find a 4-letter word meaning uncommon.
questions.explanation:
Rare.

	When something is rare, it is uncommon, meaning it does not happen, or show up, often.  For instance, tigers are rare in the wild because there are not many of them, and diamonds are rare because there are not many of them, either.

questions.text: Using only letters from CREATURE, find a 4-letter word for something that is correct, the opposite of false.
questions.explanation:
True.

	True or false questions give the option to answer true (correct) and false (incorrect).  To tell the truth would mean to say something true, and to tell a lie is to say something false.

questions.text: Using only letters from CREATURE, find a large wooden box of 5 letters.
questions.explanation:
Crate.

	The dictionary calls a crate a large, rough, wooden box.  A crate is not only the box itself, but it also means to put things in the box.

questions.text: Find a tall plant with branches, a trunk, and leaves, that is 4 letters long and uses only letters from CREATURE.
questions.explanation:
Tree.

	Trees are often called the lungs of the world because they provide oxygen for us to breathe.  Trees are usually tall, and their trunks get thicker as they grow older.  It is said that they get a new ring inside their trunk for every year they are alive.

questions.text: Using only letters from the word CREATURE, find a 3-letter word meaning a part of a play, or to fake something, like what people do in a movie.
questions.explanation:
Act.

	To act means to fake something.  For instance, in a movie, someone may act sad, because the person they play is sad, but they aren't really sad in real life.  An act in a play is a specific part of the play.  Acts are smaller parts in scenes.

questions.text: Using only letters from CREATURE, find a 5-letter word meaning to do or say something in reply.
questions.explanation:
React.

	To react is to do something in response to something else.  For instance, when you push a domino, it reacts to your finger by falling over.  A chain reaction occurs if there are more than one domino, where each domino reacts to the push of the domino that fell over previously.

questions.text: Find a 5-letter word that is usually signaled by a white flag, and is when two groups agree to stop fighting for a while, using only letters from CREATURE.
questions.explanation:
Truce.

	When someone yells "truce" and waves a white flag, they usually want to stop fighting.  For instance, on "Tom and Jerry", Tom has waved a white flag, which means that he will stop trying to catch Jerry, and Jerry will stop trying to hurt Tom.  However, a truce is only temporary, so eventually Tom begins to chase Jerry again.

questions.text: Using only letters from CREATURE, find a word meaning to go over the lines with a pencil, or a set of animal tracks, that is 5 letters long.
questions.explanation:
Trace.

	To trace is to copy over lines.  Sometimes you can put a piece of blank paper over a picture on a window or a light and trace the lines on the new piece of paper.  A trace can also mean a set of tracks, like what a detective follows to solve a case.  Finally, a trace can mean a small amount.

questions.text: Using only letters from CREATURE, find a 4-letter word for a remedy, like a treatment that will make you better when you are sick.
questions.explanation:
Cure.

	To cure someone is to make them better.  The cure is the remedy that you gave to them to make them better...  You cure them with a cure.  You can also cure meat, which means to preserve it.

questions.text: Using only letters from CREATURE, find a 3-letter word for a hearing organ.
questions.explanation:
Ear.

	An ear is something on the side of your head you use to hear things.  Most people have two ears.  Dumbo's ears were so big, he was constantly tripping over them!
